CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Corporate Partnerships relative to Elite Members?
SRP.A: Corporate Partnerships is {above} Elite Members in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Student Discounts relative to Flash Sale Subscribers?
SRP.A: Student Discounts is {above} Flash Sale Subscribers in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Family Plans relative to Corporate Partnerships?
SRP.A: Family Plans is {below} Corporate Partnerships in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total loyalty program growth?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Corporate Partnerships}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total loyalty program growth?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Elite Members}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Gift Card Users's minimum Loyalty Program Growth in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Gift Card Users's minimum Loyalty Program Growth is in {2001}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Family Plans's maximum Loyalty Program Growth in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Family Plans's maximum Loyalty Program Growth is in {1989}.

NC.Q: Between 1999 and 2002, was the average total Loyalty Program Growth higher or lower than between 1996 and 2003?
NC.A: The average total loyalty program growth between 1999 and 2002 was {lower} than between 1996 and 2003.

NC.Q: Was the total Loyalty Program Growth in 1989 higher or lower than in 1990?
NC.A: The total loyalty program growth in 1989 was {higher} than in 1990.

NC.Q: Between 1990 and 2001, did the total Loyalty Program Growth experience a larger or smaller change than between 1991 and 2000?
NC.A: The change in total loyalty program growth between 1990 and 2001 was {smaller} than between 1991 and 2000.

NC.Q: Between 1992 and 2000, did the total Loyalty Program Growth experience a larger or smaller change than between 2002 and 2003?
NC.A: The change in total loyalty program growth between 1992 and 2000 was {larger} than between 2002 and 2003.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Corporate Partnerships} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Gift Card Users and Elite Members first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Gift Card Users and Elite Members first exchanged leading positions in {1990}.
